basic.description: This course provides an introduction to effective engineering writing and speaking skills with the emphasis on technical proposals, professional correspondence, engineering reports, and oral briefings. These skills are developed in lectures and small group tutorials.
basic.subject: APSC
basic.title: Engineering Communications I

extra.enrollment_requirement: APSC291 excludes CHEE260, ELEC291, GEOL291, GEOL292 and MECH290.  Registration in a BSCE Academic Plan is required.
